Did it really happen like that?did they go to be more infantry based? I thi=
nk maybe each clans have their own elite forces. Like the oda,they are well=
 known for their ashigaru. But some others are known for their heavy cavalr=
y like the naginata cavalry.. So maybe it depends on the battle situation t=
hey are facing at that moment.. But it just my thoughts..

I for one agree with  Tony.=C2=A0  Afterall, is'nt it "Samurai  History"?=
=C2=A0  Besides, if you want to talk about utopian ideals, go blog on a GOP=
 or Democratic website or something; I think there is also  a=C2=A0long  ar=
ticle on Karl  Marx=C2=A0at wikipedia=C2=A0if  that is what rocks your boat=
.
 =C2=A0=20
On a subject that I have been curious about, and for the sake of creating =
a new topic, what was the reason for the Samurai armies to go from elite ho=
rse archers to being more infantry based?
